scripts.dev:prep: bunx wrangler d1 migrations apply werewolf-d1-dev --local --config wrangler.dev.toml
scripts.dev: bun run dev:prep && bunx wrangler dev --local --config wrangler.dev.toml --port 8787 --persist-to .wrangler/state
scripts.check: bun run typecheck && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.deploy:web: cd apps/web && SVELTE_ADAPTER=cloudflare bun run build && bunx wrangler pages deploy .svelte-kit/cloudflare --project-name werewolf --branch master --commit-dirty=true
